src:
Tunggu Kembaran Agnez Mo di Madame Tussauds Singapore
06 Nov 2019, 21:49 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Foto: (instagram/Agnezmo)

Singapura - Museum Madame Tussauds adalah salah satu tempat wisata jika jalan-jalan ke Singapura. Buat fans Agnez Mo, museum itu bakal segera jadi destinasi wajib. Sebentar lagi traveler bisa menemukan sosok Agnez Mo di museum itu.Setelah patung lilin Presiden Ir Sukarno, Ir Jokowi, dan pebulu tangkis Rudi Hartono, kini replika artis asal Indonesia akan hadir di Museum Madame Tussauds Singapura. Agnes Mo terpilih menjadi artis Indonesia pertama yang akan dibuatkan replika di Museum Madame Tussauds Singapura."Dia akan bergabung dengan barisan wajah-wajah terkenal di dunia dan akan menjadi bintang Indonesia pertama yang diabadikan di Madame Tussauds di seluruh dunia," ujar keterangan dalam rilis pihak Madame Tussauds Singapore.Pihak museum memaparkan bahwa Agnez Mo adalah artis yang paling dianugerahi penghargaan dalam sejarah Indonesia. Artis berumur 33 tahun ini telah mendapat ratusan penghargaan."Mo adalah artis yang paling dianugerahi penghargaan dalam sejarah Indonesia dengan koleksi 170 penghargaan yang luar biasa," menurut keterangan dalam rilis.Agnez Mo juga telah mengonfirmasinya di instagram. Sebenarnya ia masih ingin menyimpan rahasia ini, tapi situs resmi Madame Tussauds telah merilis keterangan tersebut."Aku mau konfirmasi bahwa iya aku akan bergabung dengan Museum Madame Tussauds Singapura dan aku akan dibuatkan replikanya. Sebenarnya kita menyimpan rahasia ini tapi keterangan resminya sudah keluar," ujar Agnez Mo.Para penggemar Agnez Mo menanyakan tentang hal ini karena mereka telah membaca rilis yang dikeluarkan oleh pihak museum. Dia kembali menegaskan bahwa dirinya akan bergabung dengan Museum Madame Tussauds."Memang iya, aku akan bergabung dengan Museum Madame Tussauds Singapura yang mana ini keren," kata Agnez.Tim Museum Madame Tussauds akan terbang ke LA untuk bertemu Agnes Mo dan melakukan perincan lebih dari 200 pengukuran. Untuk traveler yang penasaran bagaimana proses pengukurannya, bisa melihat di live instagram Agnes Mo."Pada hari Jumat 8 November, tim pahat terampil Madame Tussauds akan terbang untuk bertemu Mo di LA untuk melakukan perincian lebih dari 200 pengukuran. Selama hal itu berlangsung, Mo akan tampil live di Instagram (@AgnesMO) dan dia akam melakukan pengambilalihan IG di akun resmi Madame Tussauds Singapore (@MTsSingapore)," tulis keterangan rilis dari Museum Madame Tussauds Singapore.Simak Video "Mantap! Museum Madame Tussauds Bakal Bikin Kembaran Agnez Mo"[Gambas:Video 20detik](elk/krs)
text:
Wait for Agnez Mo's twin at Madame Tussauds Singapore
Nov 6, 2019, 21:49 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Photo: (Instagram / Agnezmo)

Singapore - Madame Tussauds Museum is one of the tourist attractions when traveling to Singapore. For Agnez Mo fans, the museum will soon become a mandatory destination. Soon the traveler can find the figure of Agnez Mo in the museum. After President S Sukarno's wax statue, Ir Jokowi, and badminton pebulu Rudi Hartono, now a replica of Indonesian artists will be present at the Madame Tussauds Museum in Singapore. Agnes Mo was chosen to be the first Indonesian artist to be made a replica at Singapore's Madame Tussauds Museum. "She will join the ranks of world-famous faces and will be the first Indonesian star to be enshrined in Madame Tussauds worldwide," said a statement in a party release. Madame Tussauds Singapore. The museum side explained that Agnez Mo was the most award-winning artist in Indonesian history. The 33-year-old artist has received hundreds of awards. "Mo is the most awarded artist in the history of Indonesia with a collection of 170 outstanding awards," according to information in the release. Agnez Mo has also confirmed it on Instagram. Actually he still wants to keep this secret, but the official website of Madame Tussauds has released the information. "I want confirmation that yes I will join the Madame Tussauds Singapore Museum and I will be made a replica. Actually we keep this secret but the official information is already out," Agnez Mo said. Agnez Mo fans asked about this because they had read the release released by the museum. He reiterated that he would join the Madame Tussauds Museum. "Indeed, I will join the Madame Tussauds Singapore Museum, which is cool," said Agnez. The Madame Tussauds Museum team will fly to LA to meet Agnes Mo and do more details. 200 measurements. For travelers who are curious about how the measurement process can be seen on Agnes Mo's live Instagram. "On Friday, November 8, the skilled carving team Madame Tussauds will fly to meet Mo in LA to detail more than 200 measurements. During this time, Mo will performed live on Instagram (@AgnesMO) and he will take over IG in Madame Tussauds Singapore's official account (@MTsSingapore), "write a release statement from the Madame Tussauds Singapore Museum. Watch Video" Great! Madame Tussauds Museum will Make Twin Agnez Mo "" Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (elk / krs)
